column4: 3 routes (2 of which serve CPs on both sides of City), plus 1 to Addenbrookes Hospital.
4 sites (2 operated by Stagecoach, 1 by Devon CC and 1 by Dartline to the hospital).
1 site (additional sites are available at Xmas with a separate URL - URL not working at present)
2 sites (run by council), 1 site run by Stagecoach
1 site (seasonal: early November to mid-January only)
1 tram site also mention of Horwich parkway and 4 sites being developed on Bury Metrolink line.
Very good example of venue/event site
Metro based at 3 stations also buses for Saturday shoppers (1 site)
5 tram & 2 bus sites to City centre also from 1 bus site to QMC
1 site in Wokingham plus 1 other site
3 park and ride sites at tram stops, also at Meadowhall for train, bus and tram
2 sites plus 8 rail stations with smaller car parks
Little information on web site, although this is not a dedicated branded service but served by a number of services
1 site plus 1 from Legoland to town centre
